title: Rep. Sherman (D-CA): Investigation into Fed is ‘Phony’
description: Rep. Brad Sherman (D-CA) calls the Fed investigation a “phony” attempt to intimidate the central bank. Speaking with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on The Close, he says Kevin Warsh backs a digital dollar to compete with crypto. (Source: Bloomberg)
